recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A quick and easy pasta recipe
steps: Boil water
Cook pasta
Add sauce

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies with a soft center.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, cream together the softened butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture until just combined.
Fold in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
Cool on wire racks and enjoy!

recipes.title: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated with fresh herbs and lemon.
steps: In a bowl, mix together lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic, olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Place the chicken breasts in a resealable bag or bowl.
Pour the marinade over the chicken and mix well to coat evenly.
Let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes (or up to 2 hours).
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat and oil the grates lightly.
Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through and internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Remove from the grill and let the chicken rest for 5 minutes.
Garnish with freshly chopped parsley and serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A colorful stir-fry packed with fresh veggies and a savory sauce.
steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the broccoli, carrots, and snap peas. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly tender.
Add the red and green bell peppers. Continue stir-frying for another 2 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce into the stir-fry and toss everything together until well-coated.
Cook for 1-2 more minutes, ensuring the vegetables are cooked but still crisp.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Simple Scrambled Eggs
recipes.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs, perfect for a quick breakfast.
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk until well-blended.
Heat butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Pour in the eggs and cook, stirring constantly, until set.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
recipes.description: A satisfying snack with natural sweetness.
steps: Toast the bread to your liking.
Spread peanut butter evenly on the toast.
Arrange banana slices on top and drizzle with honey if desired.

recipes.title: Classic Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: A crispy and gooey classic sandwich.
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place one slice butter-side-down on a skillet, add cheese, and top with the second slice (butter-side-up).
Cook over medium heat until golden, flipping to toast the other side.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A colorful stir-fry packed with fresh veggies and a savory sauce.
steps: Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the broccoli, carrots, and snap peas. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly tender.
Add the red and green bell peppers. Continue stir-frying for another 2 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce into the stir-fry and toss everything together until well-coated.
Cook for 1-2 more minutes, ensuring the vegetables are cooked but still crisp.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A creamy pasta dish with pancetta and Parmesan.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Sauté pancetta until crispy.
Toss hot spaghetti with pancetta, egg mixture, and reserved pasta water until creamy.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A flavorful and creamy Indian curry.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for 30 minutes.
Sauté onion until golden, then add tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes.
Add chicken and cook until tender.
Stir in cream, simmer, and serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: A show-stopping beef dish wrapped in pastry.
steps: Sear beef on all sides and let cool.
Cook mushrooms into a paste.
Coat beef with mustard, wrap in mushroom paste and pastry, and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 30 minutes or until golden.

recipes.title: Croissants from Scratch
recipes.description: Flaky, buttery French pastries.
steps: Prepare dough, incorporating butter through folding and rolling.
Refrigerate and repeat folding multiple times.
Shape, proof, and bake at 375°F (190°C) until golden.

recipes.title: Coq au Vin
recipes.description: A rich French chicken stew with wine.
steps: Marinate chicken in wine overnight.
Sauté vegetables, then brown chicken.
Add marinade, stock, and herbs, then simmer for 2 hours.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: A hearty and healthy soup.
steps: Chop vegetables.
Sauté onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add tomatoes and broth, then simmer for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Classic Burger
recipes.description: Juicy grilled beef burgers.
steps: Shape beef into patties.
Grill patties for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Assemble burgers with toppings and buns.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipes.description: A light and refreshing tuna salad.
steps: Drain tuna and mix with mayonnaise.
Add diced celery, salt, and pepper.
Serve with crackers or in a sandwich.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful curry with mixed vegetables.
steps: Cook potatoes and carrots in a pan until tender.
Add green beans, curry powder, and coconut milk.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Apple Pie
recipes.description: A classic dessert with sweet cinnamon apples.
steps: Mix apples with sugar and cinnamon.
Place mixture in pie crust and cover with top crust.
Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with grilled chicken.
steps: Grill chicken and set aside.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat cream, butter, and Parmesan in a pan.
Mix sauce with pasta and top with sliced chicken.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and egg.
Pour batter onto a heated griddle and cook until golden.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice and ground beef.
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Mix rice, beef, and tomato sauce.
Stuff mixture into peppers and bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.description: A vegetarian take on the classic lasagna.
steps: Layer noodles, ricotta, spinach, and marinara.
Top with mozzarella and bake at 375°F for 40 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: A comforting soup with chicken and egg noodles.
steps: Cook chicken and shred.
Simmer vegetables in broth.
Add chicken and noodles, cook until noodles are tender.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.description: A sweet breakfast treat.
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip bread in mixture and cook on a griddle.
Serve with syrup.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A simple and healthy breakfast option.
steps: Toast the bread.
Spread mashed avocado on the toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes.

recipes.title: Margarita Pizza
recipes.description: A classic Italian pizza with fresh basil.
steps: Spread tomato sauce over the pizza crust.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil.
Bake at 425°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A crisp salad with creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Chop the lettuce.
Toss with croutons, Parmesan cheese, and dressing.

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken
recipes.description: A savory chicken dish with teriyaki sauce.
steps: Cook chicken in a skillet with oil.
Add teriyaki sauce and simmer until thickened.
Garnish with green onions.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Soup
recipes.description: A creamy and warm pumpkin soup.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a pot.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend until smooth and serve.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon
recipes.description: A healthy and flavorful salmon dish.
steps: Drizzle salmon with olive oil and season with garlic powder.
Bake at 375°F for 15 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Spinach Quiche
recipes.description: A savory pie with spinach and cheese.
steps: Pre-bake the crust for 5 minutes at 375°F.
Mix spinach, cheese, eggs, and milk.
Pour into crust and bake for 35 minutes.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A creamy beef and mushroom dish.
steps: Sauté beef and onions.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

recipes.title: Shrimp Tacos
recipes.description: Tacos with seasoned shrimp and toppings.
steps: Cook shrimp with seasoning.
Fill tortillas with shrimp, coleslaw, and salsa.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: A spiced curry with mixed vegetables.
steps: Cook potatoes and carrots in a pan.
Add coconut milk and curry powder.
Simmer for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Stuffed Zucchini
recipes.description: Zucchini boats filled with ground meat and cheese.
steps: Hollow zucchinis and bake for 10 minutes.
Fill with cooked beef and sauce.
Top with cheese and bake for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Turkey Meatloaf
recipes.description: A healthier take on the classic meatloaf.
steps: Mix all ingredients.
Shape into a loaf and bake at 350°F for 50 minutes.

recipes.title: Garlic Bread
recipes.description: Crispy bread with a garlic butter spread.
steps: Mix butter, garlic, and parsley.
Spread on bread and bake at 375°F for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Tomato Bruschetta
recipes.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes.
steps: Toast bread slices.
Mix tomatoes, olive oil, and basil.
Top bread with tomato mixture.

recipes.title: Apple Crumble
recipes.description: A warm dessert with baked apples and crumb topping.
steps: Place apples in a baking dish.
Mix sugar, flour, and butter into crumbs.
Top apples with crumbs and bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara, and cheese.
steps: Bread and bake the eggplant slices at 375°F for 20 minutes.
Layer eggplant, marinara, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake for 20 minutes until bubbly.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty and nutritious soup.
steps: Sauté onions and carrots in a pot.
Add lentils and broth, simmer for 25 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Shepherd's Pie
recipes.description: A savory pie with ground meat and mashed potatoes.
steps: Cook ground beef and mix with vegetables and broth.
Layer meat mixture in a baking dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Fettuccine Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with Parmesan cheese.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat cream, butter, and Parmesan in a pan.
Mix sauce with pasta and serve.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta.
steps: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss.

recipes.title: Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.description: Mexican-style tortillas filled with chicken and cheese.
steps: Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese.
Place in a baking dish, cover with enchilada sauce and more cheese.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A moist and flavorful quick bread.
steps: Mix bananas, sugar, and butter.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F for 50 minutes.

recipes.title: Coconut Shrimp
recipes.description: Crispy shrimp coated with coconut flakes.
steps: Dip shrimp in flour, then egg, then coconut.
Fry until golden brown.

recipes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Bite-sized mushrooms filled with a cheesy mixture.
steps: Remove mushroom stems and mix filling ingredients.
Stuff mushrooms and bake at 375°F for 15 minutes.
